name: Tetropolis
description:
Building a city was never so simple (or unusual)! Shift and place sidewalk pieces to create the best possible situation for your city to grow!

Some quick tips:

  1. Industrial zones are taller than they are wide.
  2. Commercial zones are wider than they are tall.
  3. Residential zones only appear when width and height are equal.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 35: Shapeshifter.
